definition: A SymbolicExpressionRepresentation that conforms to a formal language such as a logical calculus, programming language, or mathematical notation with precise syntax and semantics.

positive_examples: The rule is written as a first-order logic formula.
The constraint is expressed in a formal specification language.
She encodes the policy as a mathematical expression.
negative_examples: The model uses informal natural language only.
He describes the idea loosely without precise notation.
The system stores a diagram with no formal semantics.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not any symbolic structure; specifically expressions in a formal language with well-defined syntax and semantics.

exemplar_texts: code snippet in a formal language
